starfleet_message: To Captain Picard, USS Enterprise-D: You are ordered to investigate the following report. A distress call has been received from a Federation science station orbiting Epsilon IV.
mission_description: The Enterprise-D is to assess and resolve the situation near the affected region. Maintain Federation safety and respond to any distress as appropriate.

dialogue_tree.line: Captain, we're approaching the coordinates of the report. A distress call has been received from a Federation science station orbiting Epsilon IV.

options.label: Open hailing frequencies.
options.crew_reply: Riker: 'Channel open, Captain. Receiving faint telemetry—no visual yet.'

options.label: Raise shields and go to yellow alert.
options.crew_reply: Data: 'Shields at full, Captain. Weapons systems standing by.'

options.label: Maintain current course.
options.crew_reply: Worf: 'Holding steady. Sensors continuing long-range scans.'

dialogue_tree.line: Captain, sensors are detecting instability nearby. The readings are fluctuating rapidly.

options.label: Divert more power to sensors.
options.crew_reply: Data: 'Rerouting auxiliary power. The signal’s clearer now—possible lifesigns detected.'

options.label: Send a message of assistance.
options.crew_reply: Picard: 'Understood. Standard rescue transmission initiated.'

options.label: Hold position and continue monitoring.
options.crew_reply: Worf: 'Acknowledged. Maintaining present course and speed.'

dialogue_tree.line: Captain, whatever’s causing this seems to be stabilizing. Awaiting your command.

options.label: Dispatch an away team.
options.crew_reply: Worf: 'Away team ready and standing by in transporter room one.'

options.label: Maintain orbit and observe.
options.crew_reply: Picard: 'Very well. Continue observation until further notice.'

options.label: Begin recovery operations.
options.crew_reply: Riker: 'Aye, Captain. Tractors engaged and recovery procedures underway.'

debriefs.text: Starfleet Command acknowledges your actions in resolving the a distress call has been received from a federation science station orbiting epsilon iv. situation. The Enterprise-D and her crew have performed admirably.

starfleet_message: To Captain Picard, USS Enterprise-D: You are ordered to investigate the following report. Sensor buoys have detected temporal fluctuations near the Neutral Zone.
mission_description: The Enterprise-D is to assess and resolve the situation near the affected region. Maintain Federation safety and respond to any distress as appropriate.

dialogue_tree.line: Captain, we're approaching the coordinates of the report. Sensor buoys have detected temporal fluctuations near the Neutral Zone.

options.label: Open hailing frequencies.
options.crew_reply: Data: 'Channel open, Captain. Receiving faint telemetry—no visual yet.'

options.label: Raise shields and go to yellow alert.
options.crew_reply: Worf: 'Shields at full, Captain. Weapons systems standing by.'

options.label: Maintain current course.
options.crew_reply: La Forge: 'Holding steady. Sensors continuing long-range scans.'

dialogue_tree.line: Captain, sensors are detecting instability nearby. The readings are fluctuating rapidly.

options.label: Divert more power to sensors.
options.crew_reply: Worf: 'Rerouting auxiliary power. The signal’s clearer now—possible lifesigns detected.'

options.label: Send a message of assistance.
options.crew_reply: Riker: 'Understood. Standard rescue transmission initiated.'

options.label: Hold position and continue monitoring.
options.crew_reply: La Forge: 'Acknowledged. Maintaining present course and speed.'

dialogue_tree.line: Captain, whatever’s causing this seems to be stabilizing. Awaiting your command.

options.label: Dispatch an away team.
options.crew_reply: La Forge: 'Away team ready and standing by in transporter room one.'

options.label: Maintain orbit and observe.
options.crew_reply: Riker: 'Very well. Continue observation until further notice.'

options.label: Begin recovery operations.
options.crew_reply: Data: 'Aye, Captain. Tractors engaged and recovery procedures underway.'

debriefs.text: Starfleet Command acknowledges your actions in resolving the sensor buoys have detected temporal fluctuations near the neutral zone. situation. The Enterprise-D and her crew have performed admirably.
